review: These are awesome binders!  Love that they are a view binder which allows you to add photos, printouts, title pages or anything you like to decorate and identify your work easily!  Was great that you get four in this set for a great price. This set of four was less money than ONE binder costs in a local store!  And the Seller shipped them quickly and they arrived in a few days time so waiting was not a problem. Well made and sturdy and the 3-ring clips open and close easily without problems.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product and this Seller!!
productTitle: Avery Economy View Binder with 2-Inch Round Ring, White, Pack Of 4 (19202)
